Copycat Chipotle Rice


Ingredients
1 tablespoon olive oil
1 1/2 cups white rice
1 teaspoon kosher salt
3 cups water
1 bay leaf
1 tablespoon lime juice
1 1/2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice
2 tablespoons chopped cilantro

Cooking Instructions

Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium high heat. Add
rice and salt and cook, stirring constantly, about 1 minute.
Add water and bay leaf and stir once. Bring to a boil,
cover, and reduce heat to a low simmer. Continue cooking
until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender, about 15
minutes. Remove from heat and fluff with a fork. Add lemon
juice, lime juice and cilantro and stir with a fork until
combined.
